creator: vgujjar@tcg-software.com
text:
I wanted to generate a protected excel files in which only a few fields will 
be editable. Howerver on reading the FAQ on the HSSF I find it is not possible 
to protect the sheet because MS encrpyts the file, but fields can be  locked.
  To circumvent this problem, I am using an blank excel file which is 
protected, and using my program I am creating a copy of this file first and 
then inserting values into this newly created file using POI. I find that I can 
acheive the desired results.
  Since I plan to extensively use this, has any one used these technique 
before, and encountered any issuses.

Regards,
Vikranth
Join the mail list.  Bugzilla isn't the place to ask questions.
creator: poi-support@buni.org
